AEY.caption: Multi Column Name
AEY.doc: This won't be shown in the pdf. Type in the multi column that you want to end here. Note that inserted elements must be between the Start and End actions.
AEY.name: multiColumnName

AGv.caption: Being repeated
AGv.doc: If this column is being repeated inside a repeating structure, use "yes". Must be the same value as it is in the "Start multi column" action.
AGv.name: being_repeated

AGw.caption: Repeating structure name
AGw.doc: The name of the repeating structure this multi column is going to be repeated into.
AGw.name: repeating_structure_name
